snippet.title: Talisman: Digital Edition Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Talisman: Digital Edition, now available on Steam! Based on the Talisman board game, Talisman: Digital Edition recreates the 4th Revised Edition of the classic adventure board game. Choose your hero and set forth on an epic tale of dragons, treasures and magic! 

Includes online and offline multiplayer modes for up to 6 players.
Link to our website - http://nomadgames.co.uk/  

Link to steam store page - http://store.steampowered.com/app/247000/ 

Talisman © Games Workshop Limited 1983, 1985, 1994, 2007. Talisman: Digital Edition © Games Workshop Limited 2014. Games Workshop, Talisman, Talisman: Digital Edition, the foregoing marks' respective logos and all associated marks, logos, characters, products and illustrations from the Talisman game are either ®, TM and/or © Games Workshop Limited 1983-2014, variably registered in the UK and other countries around the world. This edition published under license to Nomad Games Ltd. All Rights Reserved to their respective owners.
